headline: Cuomo’s 2020 Vision: Battling Stormy Seas, and ‘Reefs of Greed’
abstract: The New York governor commissioned a surreal poster that shows him navigating a “sea of division” and “squalls of hate.”
lead_paragraph: ALBANY, N.Y. — A rainbow-colored Arc of the Moral Universe. The Burr-Hamilton duel. An octopus called Intolerance.
